name: Mountain View Backpackers Wanaka
description:
We are a small, friendly, and cosy hostel with 30 beds converted from a 1930’s home. We are perfectly located, just a two-minute walk from the centre of town and beautiful Lake Wanaka. 

One of our most favourite and popular features is our garden, where you will find fresh herbs and at certain times of the year home-grown vegetables. Open to everyone to help themselves.

Our friendly staff are from all over the world (usually they start as guests and just never want to leave) and you will find more about who is scrubbing your toilet and making your bed on our “who we are board”.  It also includes photos of Buddy and Kiera, the cats who have adopted us and are often found sleeping on the couch or demanding more food (they meow as if they are starving!!). There are also photos of Paige, Graham and family – the local pet kunekune pigs we feed. 

Our staff also love to help you plan your time here. Chill out by the lake, climb Roy’s Peak, catch at movie at the famous Paradiso Cinema, visit the lavender farm, go hiking. There is also many adrenaline activities available including endless bike trails (why not try Heli-biking?) skiing, mountaineering, sky diving or even canyoning. In fact Wanaka has the highest Via Ferrata in the world (where you climb up a waterfall) and one of the only places you can fly a plane whilst soaring over the glaciers… yes you as the pilot!

Wanaka is the perfect base for exploring and has something for everyone – Ask Hayley at reception who has done pretty much every activity in town, and she is happy to share some local secrets.

Please remember to always included your mobile number when booking so we can contact you if you have not arrived before reception closes** Check in is from 2pm until 5.00 pm. Late check in is by arrangement only. Please ensure you contact hostel to organise or ensure you have enough funds on your provided credit card so we can take payment. We are unable to leave keys out for guests who have not paid. Valid ID must be provided at check in

Checkout is before 10am. (Luggage storage available).
We are not a party hostel and have low noise after 10pm. There are plenty of bars in town to enjoy. Drunk behaviour is not tolerated.
Special Terms and Conditions over Christmas/New Years (including the hostel not accepting under 20 year olds) Details will be emailed (failure to respond will result in your booking being cancelled) For all other times we do not have the facilities to have anyone under the age of 18. Sorry !

Should you want private use of an entire room please contact us directly as with some group bookings we are unable to guarantee that you will be all in the same room. Please note we have a 48-hour cancellation policy.

From our little family, we look forward to welcoming you to Mountain View Backpackers – “your home away from home”.

houseRules.notes:
**please remember to always included your mobile number when booking so we can contact you if you have not arrived before reception closes**

We look forward to welcoming you to Mountain View Backpackers, your "home away from home". 
Please note that some bookings need to be discussed/booked directly, and this may lead to your booking being amended or cancelled. 

Please contact us for the following:
* Any groups over 6 people (no tour groups permitted)
* Stays longer than 10 days for any one person 
* No one under the age of 18, Children are not permitted
* All New Years bookings

Parking: is on a first come first served basis. There is plenty of free parking in the street as well. 
Beds: Top bunk/bottom bunks cannot be reserved; they too are on a first come basis
Friends: Although we do our best, we cannot guarantee that you will all be in the same room. Please contact us directly for all requests and we will do our best
Reception Hours: 8.30am - 12 noon & 2pm - 5pm  
Early Arrivals: Yes you can arrive and we can store your bags for you. 
Late Arrivals: Absolutely! Please let us know in advance or if it is unplanned you will find information on the front door with your name on it on how to find your welcome letter and keys to let yourself in. Please ensure you have sufficient funds on your credit card for us to take prepayment (to avoid any issues as we are unable to leave keys out for unpaid beds) . If you do run into any issues all staff phone numbers are on the front door.
Should you need to cancel please remember that we need to receive in writing 48 hours prior to your arrival (based on 2pm checkin) otherwise one night fee will be charged. No cancellations/refunds once you have checked in 
 
**XMAS and New Year**
No arrival departures Christmas or Boxing Day (25 & 26) and no arrival/departure 31st December or 1st January

Rules of NEW YEARS include:
-Minimum of 4 nights over New Years
-No check ins or outs on the 31st December or the 1st January
-The first night will be charged at time of booking. 
-This is fully refundable up until 5 days before arrival date.

Please note we are a Dry Hostel from the 27th December – January 5th . All Alcohol will be confiscated and returned when you depart.

No Groups over 6 people.

Over New Years all guests must be 20 years or over - ID will be checked (Management has the right to refuse stay if any guests are unable to provide ID )

If any of the above rules are broken or disrespected you will be immediately be removed/evicted from the hostel and full loss of payment.

Any other questions please let us know.
We look forward to seeing you soon.
